data.requested_item_info: { 	"record_fields": [{ 			"item_id": "100004", 			"field_name": "legal_person_card_id", 			"name": "企业法人身份证号", 			"type": 1, 			"tips": "", 			"placeholder": "请输入企业法人身份证号", 			"tooltip": "需要填写完整身份证号", 			"required": 1, 			"string_check_rule": { 				"min_string_length": 1, 				"max_string_length": 50, 				"validator": "idcard" 			}, 			"need_encrypt": true 		}, 		{ 			"item_id": "100005", 			"field_name": "legal_person_cert_type", 			"name": "企业法人证件类型", 			"type": 4, 			"tips": "", 			"placeholder": "请选择证件类型", 			"tooltip": "", 			"required": 0, 			"enum_check_rule": { 				"min_list_length": 1, 				"max_list_length": 1, 				"enum_values": ["大陆居民身份证", "港澳台通行证"] 			}, 			"need_encrypt": false 		}, 		{ 			"item_id": "100006", 			"field_name": "inland_cert_card_image", 			"name": "大陆居民身份证照片", 			"type": 2, 			"tips": "请上传图片", 			"placeholder": "", 			"tooltip": "需要正面和反面两张照片", 			"required": 1, 			"need_encrypt": false, 			"file_check_rule": { 				"min_list_length": 2, 				"max_list_length": 2, 				"enum_file_exts": ["png", "jpg", "jpeg"], 				"max_file_size": 5 			}, 			"relations": [{ 				"source_key": 100005, 				"source_value": "大陆居民身份证" 			}] 		} 	] }
